sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Navbar, Nav, Container, Image, NavDropdown} from "react-bootstrap" import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import { logout } from '../actions/userAction'; function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.user) const dispatch = useDispatch() const {userinfo} = userLogin const logoutHandler = () =>{ dispatch.apply(logout) } return (
ProShop
Cart {userinfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : Sign In}
) } export default Header
